11.content:

Waking up you slowly open your eyes since the headache seems to have left them a bit sensitive to the light. Once your sure they are fine you sit up while opening your eyes and take a look around. Every thing is strange looking. You start to panic when you Notice you've actually been shrunken down. A loud booming sound is heard followed by huge earthquake like tremors. 12.content:
Despite it being a Friday, today seemed like a considerably long day at school. You finally make it to the comfortable confines of your home, where you seem to be home alone for now. Walking through your bedroom door, you drop down your backpack and flop onto your bed; letting out a deep sigh. You were actually supposed to be going on a school trip that would last for the duration of the weekend which would also be a three day weekend due to a Teacher's Workday. You were at your house because you forgot to pack a couple of things. As your search through a box, something inside of it catches your eye. You pick up what seems to be some kind of glass vial filled with a clear liquid that looked like ordinary water.

"What is this?" you ask aloud as you turn the vial around in all angles to examine it. You pull off the top of the vial and take a whiff... it had no smell. You then decide to drink a small sip to test it.

PSSSShhhhhhhh........

You spit out the liquid and through away the vial, but you already swallowed some of it.

"That was disgusting, were the hell did that come from?"

You are about to continue packing when you suddenly get a large headache. You haven't really been feeling good this whole day and you wonder if it's worth it to go on the school trip. After some consideration you finally decide to call the assembler of the trip and explain that you didn't feel good and wouldn't be able to make it. You then decide to take some Aspirin pills and then watch some TV.
12.title: Let the Fun Begin!

124.content:
Before you can even turn your television on, your body starts to have a very strange tingly under your skin feeling spread throughout it. You notice your clothes begin to feel very loose and heavy. Everything in your room is growing and expanding! You realize that you are shrinking! You watch as everything gets bigger and bigger, your clothes are starting to slip off of you. You rip off the clothing, knowing that if you don't do it now while you have the size and the strength, it will probably smother you!

You were completely naked and still shrinking, by now you were under the height of your nearby dresser. You collapsed to the ground very soon, between the headaches, tingly feeling and the shock; you pass out on your bedroom floor.

A few minutes later you wake up except it was like you were in a whole new world. You were surrounded amongst a jungle of tree-sized tan strands of fabric. You climbed up one of these strands until you reached the frayed surface on top. From up here you realized that you were on top of a single carpet strand out of the millions throughout the house. You could see the items of your bedroom like your dresser and bed, tower like gigantic buildings. The ceiling was like a sky, seemingly several miles above.

"Shit, this is crazy", you say aloud, "I'm going need to get someone's help." You think that it shouldn't be that big of a problem but then you remember that your mom and older sister both think you are on that field trip still! It would already be hard enough to get their attention at this size but when they aren't expect to see you for next three days? Things are a little more complicated.

You need to figure out your next move. What will that be?
124.title: Complicated Predicament

choices: Let her go and find a safer way.
1242.content:
"If no one is expecting me to come home for the next few days, there is no need to stay inside this bedroom...", you think aloud, "Maybe my Mom or my sis is home. They would help me if I can get to them!" You walk amongst the top of the carpet strands, careful not to fall in between them and into the abyss under the carpet. It would make a few moments but you would finally reach your vast bedroom door. The door was closed but you were easily able to walk under the large gap under the door. You were now in the hallway. The hallway was no long an enclosed, sort of cramped walkway but a large expanse of carpeted floor and a few doors on the walls.

You look to see where you should travel next when suddenly the ground vibrates with intense energy. A thunderous booming is heard in an rhythmic pattern. You look down the hallway to see the source pop into view. It was you older sister, but now a giantess, no, at your very insignificant height, she was much more. She was a goddess to you. You cried out and waved your arms as she walked down the hallway towards your direction. She wore a plaid v-neck shirt that showed her well-developed cleavage and wore tight fitting jeans. Her beautiful blonde hair flowed with each step from bare-feet crashing onto the hallway floor; causing the loud noises and the earthquakes! "Sis!", you cried out but 1) your voice was too small, 2) even if she heard you, you were way too tiny to be seen, 3) it didn't help that she was too busy talking on her cell phone.

"Yeah, I think he likes her but just doesn't want to show it to act cool!", your sister (sis') says on the phone with a loud powerful voice. As she got closer, you realized just how insignificant you were. She seemed to be more than a mile in height! Her barefeet were easily larger than more than a couple of aircraft carriers placed top and bottom. You stayed near the wall of the hallway as to avoid her gigantic foot as she stepped right next to you. You cringed as the ground shook more than ever from her being so close. You look up and see that your sis seems to be adjusting something on her clothes for a quick second. Now can be your chance to do something.

13.content:
You woke up to a common feeling in a room not your own. You could feel the large weight on top of you, pinning you down into her bed. You could feel and taste and smell her feet as she rubbed them over your face - one blocking your nose, the other with plump, painted toes pointed into your mouth. Nothing unusual so far. Then you could feel your sister's feet join your mother's on your face. Her smaller, pale toes rubbed your cheeks in loving reassurance and mockery as she held your head stiff, allowing your mom to fit more of her foot into your mouth. You glanced at the bedside clock - 9:15am. Your exam had started a quarter of an hour ago. Looks like you weren't going to school today. You'd pleaded with your mom for weeks about this. Finally, after weeks of good behaviour and submission to her and your sister your mom had agreed to let you take your last exam today after you'd allowed her to stomp and squish your unprotected groin for an hour straight. Your mom loved you dearly, you knew that, but she also took great pleasure in dominating you physically, especially by standing on your boy-parts and sitting on your face.

Suddenly she stopped, and everything changed. She released your ears but only briefly as she coiled her toned cheerleader legs around your neck and held your face tight to the bed, strangling you. Your mom looked so excited she was trembling, her immense gelatinous bum jiggling where it lay against your beaten groin as she pinched her purple-painted toes shut over your nose and, with a loving kiss, shoved her big foot down your throat to her ankle. You choked, tried to breath but your mouth and nose were blocked. You bucked your hips, but were tied securely to the bedposts. Soon, your body gave in, and you went under, the bottom of your mom's foot on your tongue.

You were still on your mom's bed, but they were nowhere to be seen. You walked to the edge of the room, head still spinning, and pumped into the wall. It was warm, soft and squishy. And smelled just like your mother's foot. "No-!"

You opened your mouth and dragged your tongue across the surface. You had to know. "That taste ..." Panicking, you stuck your tongue out again and licked again and again, but no matter what the taste and smell were coming back now. Suddenly you felt a slightly softer texture in the wall, a different variety, and then you heard massive, earth-rattling giggling as your sister moved her feet away from you and your mom and sis stared down at your now shrunken body.

You were used to submitting to your mom and big sister's dominant fetishes - they took care of you after all - but this was something new entirely!

"What ... what is this?"

151.content: You go into the kitchen feeling hungry for breakfast, no one else is awake yet which gives you plenty of time to yourself in the morning.
